info.name: Fix TweetDeck Scrollbars in Firefox (dark theme)
info.description: Firefox scrollbars are not stylable via CSS, and the default scrollbars tend to look extremely ugly, especially with the dark theme. This fixes that and makes them look just like in chrome.
info.additionalInfo: Thanks to https://userstyles.org/styles/68236/scrollbar-template-simple-scheme-boilerplate for a nice example script about styling toolbars in firefox.
